alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:01PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marin, southeastern Sonoma and south central Napa Counties through 1215 PM PST... At 1201 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Petaluma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Petaluma, Rohnert Park, Sonoma, Cotati, Boyes Hot Springs, Yountville, Eldridge, Temelec, El Verano, Fetters Hot Spring, Glen Ellen and Fetters Hot Springs-Agua Caliente. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
